item.title: Bedos Leatherworks Toe Taps Review
item.description: Bedo’s Leather Works is a cobbler business located in Falls Church VA and is currently run by Steve Doudaklian. Steve does a lot of amazing work on seemingly anything made of leather. You might be familiar with some of his videos where he restored a pair of Allen Edmonds Strands or his famous Florshiem restorations. Check out his YoutTube channel it’s mesmerizing. New Alden Loafers I recently got a pair of wonderful Alden shell loafers from Brick & Mortar Seattle (above) and I wanted to extend the life of the soles a little.
